local_intent: Verify grape visibility, move to a pregrasp above it, perform precise approach and alignment, then confirm arrival at the grape.
assumptions: Workspace is static and reachable; pregrasp path is collision-free.
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase using the same target (grape) as in GLOBAL_BT: pregrasp via MoveAbove, precise ApproachAndAlign, and verification with IsAt.
